poem:
Title: Dream-Spun Tapestry

Hyena daemon, draped
in Hessian hues,
you craft a carnival
of chameleonic truths.
Alice, lost in Indian partition,
finds herself in new dimensions,
speaking dialogue unimagined.

The Duchess and the Truckers,
a 70s fusion,
mingle in Lewis Carroll confusion.
A theatre of national pride,
revealing bright, the stage's side;
Such is the creative tide,
in coffeeshops and mornings.
